prequal.name: Lets get started
prequal.title: Lets get started
prequal.intro1: Thank you for your interest in the Leiomyosarcoma (LMS) Project.
prequal.intro2: Here's what sign up and participation looks like:
prequal.intro2_l1: Registration - Answer a few short questions about yourself or your child (3 min)
prequal.intro2_l2: Consent form - Read through and sign the consent form (10-15 min)
prequal.intro2_l3: Medical Release Form - Tell us where you or your child have been treated (5 min)
prequal.intro2_l4: Surveys - Answer questions about you or your child's experience with cancer (10-15 min)

who_enrolling.prompt: First, who is signing up for the LMS Project?*
who_enrolling.myself: I have been diagnosed with LMS and I'm signing myself up.
who_enrolling.child: My child has been diagnosed with LMS and I am signing up for them or with them.

age.prompt: How old are you? / How old is your child? *
age.range_hint: Please enter an age between 0 and 110
age.restriction_hint: In order to participate in the project, a parent needs to help you. When your parent is with you, click back and select "My child has been diagnosed" and complete the registration together.

country.prompt: Where do you live? / Where does your child live? *
country.label: Select Country
country.ineligible_hint: Project Singular is currently open only to participants in the United States and Territories or Canada. Thank you for your interest.

cancer.c_multiple_myeloma: Mieloma múltiple (MM) / Neoplasia de células plasmáticas
cancer.c_group_brain_brain_or_cns_tumors: Tumores cerebrales o del sistema nervioso central
cancer.c_brain_unspecified: Tumor cerebral (no especificado de otra manera)
cancer.c_brain_brain_stem_glioma: Glioma del tronco encefálico / Glioma Protuberancial Intrínseco Difuso (GPID)
cancer.c_brain_diffuse_midline_glioma: Glioma difuso de la línea media
cancer.c_brain_etmr: Tumor embrionario con rosetas de capas múltiples (TERCM)
cancer.c_brain_germ_cell_tumor: Tumor de células germinales del cerebro / tumor de células germinativas del SNC (TCG)
cancer.c_brain_optic_glioma: Glioma del nervio óptico / glioma óptico
cancer.c_brain_cns_lymphoma: Linfoma primario del sistema nervioso central (LPSNC) / Linfoma del sistema nervioso central (SNC)
cancer.c_gastro_appendix_gcc: Cáncer de apéndice - Tumor carcinoide de células caliciformes (CCC)
cancer.c_gastro_cholangiocarcinoma: Colangiocarcinoma / Cáncer de las vías biliares
cancer.c_genitourinary_germ_cell_tumor: Tumor de células germinales extragonadales / Tumor de células germinales
cancer.c_genitourinary_rcc_renal_cell: Cáncer de riñón / Carcinoma de células renales (CCR), todos los subtipos
cancer.c_genitourinary_tcc_renal_pelvis_ureter: Tratamiento del cáncer de células de transición de pelvis renal y de uréter (CCT)
cancer.c_genitourinary_testicular_cancer: Cáncer testicular /  Tumor de células germinales de testículo
cancer.c_genitourinary_urethral_cancer: Cáncer uretral / carcinoma primario de uretra
cancer.c_gynecologic_ovarian_cancer: Cáncer de ovario / Cáncer de trompas de Falopio / Cáncer peritoneal primario
cancer.c_gynecologic_ogct: Tumor de células germinales ováricas (Tumor de células germinales del ovario)
cancer.c_gynecologic_scst: Tumor estromal de los cordones sexuales ováricos, todos los subtipos
cancer.c_gynecologic_uterine_carcinosarcoma: Carcinosarcoma uterino / Tumor Muleriano Mixto Maligno (TMMM)
cancer.c_head_neck_metastatic_squamous_neck: Cáncer escamoso metastásico de cuello con primario oculto
cancer.c_head_neck_oral_cancer: Cáncer oral / Cáncer de la cavidad bucal / Cáncer labial
cancer.c_head_neck_sinus_nasal_cavity: Cáncer de senos paranasales y cavidad nasal
cancer.c_head_neck_tongue_cancer: Cáncer de lengua / Carcinoma de lengua
cancer.c_leukemia_acute_lymphoblastic: Leucemia linfoblástica aguda (LLA) / Leucemia linfocítica aguda
cancer.c_leukemia_aml_acute_myeloid: Leucemia mieloide aguda (LMA; Leucemia mielógena aguda)
cancer.c_leukemia_b_pll_b_cell_prolymphocytic: Leucemia prolinfocítica B (LPL-B; Leucemia prolinfocítica de células B)
cancer.c_leukemia_bpdcn: Neoplasia blástica de células dendríticas plasmacitoides (NBCDP)
cancer.c_leukemia_cll_sll: Leucemia linfocítica crónica (LLC) / Linfoma linfocítico de células pequeñas (Linfoma de linfocitos pequeños)
cancer.c_leukemia_chronic_myelogenous: Leucemia mielógena crónica / leucemia mieloide crónica (LMC) / Leucemia granulocítica crónica
cancer.c_leukemia_hcl_hairy_cell: Leucemia de células pilosas (Leucemia de células peludas)
cancer.c_leukemia_lgl: Leucemia linfocítica granular de células grandes (LLGG) / leucemia de células T grandes granulares / Leucemia de linfocitos granulares grandes de células NK
cancer.c_leukemia_t_pll_t_cell_prolymphocytic: Leucemia prolinfocítica T (LPL-T; Leucemia prolinfocítica de células T)
cancer.c_lymphomas_adult_t_cell: Leucemia/linfoma de células T del adulto (LLLTA; Leucemia/linfoma de linfocitos T del adulto)
cancer.c_lymphomas_b_all_lbl_b_lymphoblastic: Leucemia/linfoma linfoblástico de células B (Leucemia/linfoma de linfocitos B)
cancer.c_lymphomas_t_all_lbl_t_lymphoblastic: Leucemia/linfoma linfoblástico de células T (leucemia/linfoma de linfocitos T)
cancer.c_lymphomas_aitl_angioimmunoblastic_t_ce: Linfoma angioinmunoblástico de células T (LAIT; Linfoma angioinmunoblástico de linfocitos T)
cancer.c_lymphomas_burkitt: Linfoma de Burkitt / Linfoma de células de Burkitt
cancer.c_lymphomas_ctcl_cutaneous_t_cell: Linfoma cutáneo de células T (LCCT; Linfoma cutáneo de linfocitos T)
cancer.c_lymphomas_ctcl_cutaneous_t_cell_mycosi: Linfoma cutáneo de células T, Micosis fungoide
cancer.c_lymphomas_ctcl_cutaneous_t_cell_ss: Linfoma cutáneo de células T, Síndrome de Sézary (SS)
cancer.c_lymphomas_dlbcl_diffuse_large_b_cell: Linfoma difuso de células B grandes (LDBG)
cancer.c_lymphomas_nktl: Linfoma extranodal nasal de células T/NK / Linfoma extranodal de linfocitos T citolíticos naturales, tipo nasal
cancer.c_lymphomas_hstcl_hepatosplenic_t_cell: Linfoma de células T hepatoesplénico (Linfoma de linfocitos T hepatoesplénico)
cancer.c_lymphomas_ivlbcl_intravascular_b_cell: Linfoma intravascular de células B grandes (linfoma intravascular de linfocitos B grandes)
cancer.c_lymphomas_marginal_zone: Linfoma de células B de la zona marginal (LCBZM ;Linfoma de linfocitos B de la zona marginal) / Linfoma esplénico de la zona marginal (LEZM)
cancer.c_lymphomas_non_hodgkin: Linfoma no Hodgkin / Linfoma no hodgkiniano (LNH)
cancer.c_lymphomas_ptcl: Linfoma periférico de células T (LPTC; Linfoma periférico de linfocitos T) / Linfoma de células T asociado a enteropatía
cancer.c_lymphomas_pcfcl: Linfoma folicular cutáneo primario (LFCP; Linfoma primario cutáneo del centro folicular)
cancer.c_lymphomas_pmbl: Linfoma de células B grandes mediastínico primario / Linfoma mediastínico (tímico) de células B grandes
cancer.c_lymphomas_waldenstrom: Macroglobulinemia de Waldenstrom / Macroglobulinemia de Waldenström (MW)
cancer.c_lungs_not_specified: Cáncer de pulmón (no especificado de otra manera)
cancer.c_lungs_bct_bronchial_carcinoid: Tumor/adenoma carcinoide bronquial (TCB) / Tumor carcinoide pulmonar
cancer.c_lungs_lcnec: Carcinoma de pulmón neuroendocrino de células grandes
cancer.c_lungs_nsclc: Cáncer pulmonar de células no pequeñas (CPCNP): todos los subtipos, inlcuido el carcinoma pulmonar de células grandes (CPCG), adenocarcinoma pulmonar, y carcinoma de células escamosas de pulmón
cancer.c_melanomas_cutaneous_melanoma: Melanoma cutáneo / Melanoma de la piel
cancer.c_sarcoma_cutaneous: Sarcoma cutáneo / Dermatofibrosarcoma protuberante (DFSP) / Fibroxantoma atípico (FXA)
cancer.c_sarcoma_desmoid_fibrosis: Fibrosis de tipo desmoide / Tumor desmoide (FD)
cancer.c_sarcoma_dsrct: Tumor desmoplásico de células pequeñas redondas (TDCPR)
cancer.c_sarcomas_ups: Sarcoma pleomórfico indiferenciado / Histiocitoma fibroso maligno (HFM)
cancer.c_skin_bcc_basal_cell: Carcinoma basocelular (CBC; Carcinoma de células basales)
cancer.c_skin_adnexal_tumor: Tumores de los anexos de la piel / Tumores anexiales cutáneos
cancer.c_skin_scc_squamous_cell: Carcinoma de células escamosas de la piel (CCE)
cancer.c_thyroid_differentiated: Cáncer diferenciado de tiroides (incluido papilar, folicular, cáncer de células de Hurthle)
cancer.c_thyroid_medullary: Cáncer medular de tiroides (tumor neuroendocrino de tiroides / Células parafoliculares / Células C)
cancer.c_thyroid_undifferentiated: Cáncer indiferenciado de tiroides / Carcinoma anaplásico de tiroides (CAT)
cancer.c_thyroid_not_specified: Cáncer de tiroides (no especificado de otra manera)

family_history.name: Antecedentes familiares de cáncer
family_history.title: Antecedentes familiares de cáncer

status.created: Completar los antecedentes familiares de cáncer nos ayudará a entender el papel que su genética ha tenido en su enfermedad.
status.inprogress: Completar los antecedentes familiares de cáncer nos ayudará a entender el papel que su genética ha tenido en su enfermedad.
status.complete: Gracias por proporcionar información sobre sus antecedentes familiares de cáncer. Puede revisar y actualizar si es necesario.

sex.prompt: ¿Qué <u title="Sex assigned at birth is the assignment and classification of people as male, female, or intersex based on a combination of hormones, chromosomes, external and internal anatomy.">sexo</u> se le asignó a esta persona cuando nació?
sex.label: Seleccione

additional_details.p1: ¿Hay algún aspecto singular de la estructura de su familia consanguínea que no se haya podido registrar completamente en esta encuesta?
additional_details.p2: ¿Existen otros factores en sus antecedentes personales o familiares que puedan haber afectado a su riesgo de desarrollar cáncer?
additional_details.p3: Si es así, facilite esta información a continuación.

family_history.family_side_parent1: Padre biológico 1: Asignado Femenino en el nacimiento
family_history.family_side_parent2: Padre biológico 2: Assigned Masculino en el nacimiento
family_history.siblings_note: Nota: Tendrá la oportunidad de agregar medios-hermanos en el siguiente paso.
family_history.intro: A continuación, proporcione información sobre los miembros de su familia biológica. Si no sabe la respuesta a alguna de las preguntas, seleccione "No sé".
family_history.intro_parent: Brinde información sobre sus<u title="A biological parent (birth parent; blood-related parent) is a person whose genetic material resulted in a child. Mostly commonly for a male this is by contributing sperm, and for a female by providing the ovum (egg). Although in some cases adoptive parents may nurture and raise a child throughout their life, adoptive parents are not biologically related to the child."> padres biológicos (consanguíneos; de nacimiento)</u> más abajo. Si no sabe la respuesta a alguna de las preguntas, seleccione "No sé".
family_history.intro_p1: Conocer los antecedentes de cáncer en la familia biológica de una persona ayuda a los investigadores a descubrir factores de riesgo genético que favorezcan la aparición de algunos tipos de cáncer. Los pacientes son la mejor fuente para conocer los detalles del cáncer en su familia.
family_history.intro_p2: Esta encuesta requiere aproximadamente 15-25 minutos y todas las preguntas son opcionales.
family_history.intro_p3: Si tiene alguna pregunta sobre esta encuesta, no dude en ponerse en contacto con nuestro equipo en info@joincountmein.org o en 651-403-5556.
family_history.intro_p4: Gracias por colaborar con nosotros para hacer posible esta investigación.
family_history.additional_info_title: Información adicional sobre su participación y privacidad en esta encuesta.
family_history.additional_info_p1: Tenga en cuenta que todas las personas que participan en un proyecto "Count me" reciben la encuesta. No le pedimos que complete la encuesta por los resultados asociados a su participación en el proyecto. Le pedimos que lo haga para recopilar más información que pueda ayudar a los investigadores del cáncer.
family_history.additional_info_p2: La protección de su privacidad es importante para nosotros. La información que se recopile esta encuesta se compartirá únicamente como datos anónimos para los fines de la investigación científica.
family_history.instructions_self_p1: En esta encuesta nos gustaría conocer el nivel de vida, la edad y los antecedentes de cáncer de las personas de su familia biológica, o consanguínea. Somos conscientes de que hay muchos tipos de familia diferentes, por lo que le rogamos que omita las secciones que no se apliquen a su árbol genealógico.
family_history.instructions_governed_p1: En esta encuesta nos gustaría conocer el nivel de vida, la edad y los antecedentes de cáncer de las personas de la familia biológica, o consanguínea, de su hijo(a). Somos conscientes de que hay muchos tipos de familia diferentes, por lo que le rogamos que omita las secciones que no se apliquen a su árbol genealógico.
family_history.instructions_p2: Le agradecemos que nos facilite toda la información que conozca, pero no pasa nada si hay detalles que no puede proporcionar. Si no sabe la respuesta a alguna de las preguntas, seleccione "No sé".
family_history.person_age: ¿Qué edad estima que tiene esta persona en la actualidad (si está viva) o qué edad estima que tenía cuando falleció?
family_history.nickname_hint:
Ejemplos: Madre biológica; Madre; Mamá; C.N.; Carol, etc.
Nota: Proporcionar un término para identificar a este miembro de la familia le ayudará a seguir el rastro de los miembros de la familia a medida que avanza en la encuesta.
family_history.jewish_ancestry_hint: Las personas con ascendencia judía askenazí son más propensas a tener mutaciones en los genes BRCA1 y BRCA2, que aumentan el riesgo de tener cáncer de mama, ovario y otros.
family_history.none_of_the_above: Ninguna de ellas describe completamente a esta persona.
family_history.family_side: ¿A qué lado de la familia pertenece esta persona?

cancer.select_age: Seleccione la edad al momento del diagnóstico
cancer.estimated_age: Edad estimada al momento del diagnóstico
cancer.has_cancer: ¿Se le ha diagnosticado alguna vez cáncer a esta persona?

family_history.parent_idk: I do not have any information to provide on this parent.

about_you.intro_text: Please tell us more about you by answering the questions below. As you fill out the questions, the answers will be automatically saved. If you would like to leave the survey and complete it at another time, it will be available in the Dashboard. You can reach us by emailing info@lmsproject.org if you have any questions. If you would like to withdraw from the project, you can contact the team at info@lmsproject.org at any time. Any information that has already been entered into the system cannot be withdrawn, however no additional data will be generated.
about_you.assigned_sex_prompt: What sex were you assigned at birth?
about_you.assigned_sex_note: Sex assigned at birth is the assignment and classification of people as male, female, or intersex based on a combination of external anatomy, internal anatomy, hormones, and chromosomes.
about_you.gender_identity_prompt: What is your gender identity? Select all that apply
about_you.gender_identity_note1: Gender identity is a term to describe a person's inner sense of being male, female, both, neither or some other gender. It can correspond to or differ from a person's sex assigned at birth.
about_you.race_prompt: Which of the following categories best describes you?
about_you.race_note: Select all that apply. Note you may select more than one group.
about_you.hispanic_info: Since you selected "Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish" in the previous question, we would like to ask some follow up questions about your racial and ethnic identity.
about_you.mixed_race_prompt: Do you consider yourself to be mixed race, that is belonging to more than one racial group, such as Mestizo, Mulatto or some other mixed race, or not?
about_you.afro_hispanic_prompt: Do you consider yourself to be Afro-Latino, Afro-Hispanic, Afro-Caribbean, or not?
about_you.afro_hispanic_note: (An Afro-Latino or Afro-Hispanic is a Latino or Hispanic with black African ancestry)
about_you.indigenous_native_prompt: Do you consider yourself to be indigenous or Native American (such as Purepecha, Mixteco, Zapoteco, Nahua, Maya, Tzotzil, Taino, Arawak, Quiche, Aymara, Quechua, Kwichua, Mapuche, Guarani, or some other indigenous or Native American origin), or not?
about_you.other_comments_prompt: Tell us anything else you would like about yourself or your cancer.
about_you.how_hear_prompt: How did you hear about the project?
about_you.nested-race-hint-text: Provide the name of the tribe in which you are enrolled or affiliated or your tribal descent.

about_child.intro_text: Please tell us more about your child by answering the questions below. As you fill out the questions, the answers will be automatically saved. If you would like to leave the survey and complete it at another time, it will be available in the Dashboard. You can reach us by emailing info@lmsproject.org if you have any questions. If you would like to withdraw from the project, you can contact the team at info@lmsproject.org at any time. Any information that has already been entered into the system cannot be withdrawn, however no additional data will be generated.
about_child.assigned_sex_prompt: What sex was your child assigned at birth?
about_child.assigned_sex_note: Sex assigned at birth is the assignment and classification of people as male, female, or intersex based on a combination of external anatomy, internal anatomy, hormones, and chromosomes.
about_child.gender_identity_prompt: What is your child's gender identity? Select all that apply
about_child.gender_identity_note1: Gender identity is a term to describe a person's inner sense of being male, female, both, neither or some other gender. It can correspond to or differ from a person's sex assigned at birth.
about_child.race_prompt: Which of the following categories best describes your child?
about_child.race_note: Select all that apply. Note you may select more than one group.
about_child.hispanic_info: Since you selected "Hispanic, Latino, or Spanish" in the previous question, we would like to ask some follow up questions about $ddp.isGovernedParticipant("your child's","your") racial and ethnic identity.
about_child.mixed_race_prompt: Do you consider your child to be mixed race, that is belonging to more than one racial group, such as Mestizo, Mulatto or some other mixed race, or not?
about_child.afro_hispanic_prompt: Do you consider your child to be Afro-Latino, Afro-Hispanic, Afro-Caribbean, or not?
about_child.afro_hispanic_note: (An Afro-Latino or Afro-Hispanic is a Latino or Hispanic with black African ancestry)
about_child.indigenous_native_prompt: Do you consider your child to be indigenous or Native American (such as Purepecha, Mixteco, Zapoteco, Nahua, Maya, Tzotzil, Taino, Arawak, Quiche, Aymara, Quechua, Kwichua, Mapuche, Guarani, or some other indigenous or Native American origin), or not?
about_child.other_comments_prompt: Tell us anything else you would like about your child or their cancer.
about_child.how_hear_prompt: How did you hear about the project?
about_child.nested-race-hint-text: Provide the name of the tribe in which you are enrolled or affiliated or your tribal descent.

race.americanindian_or_alaskan_note: (For example: Aztec, Blackfeet Tribe, Mayan, Navajo Nation, Native Village of Barrow (Utqiagvik) Inupiat Traditional Government, Nome Eskimo Community, etc.)
race.tribe_label: Tribe you are enrolled or affiliated or your tribal descent
race.provide_name_of_tribe: Provide the name of the tribe in which you are enrolled or affiliated or your tribal descent. (For example: Aztec, Blackfeet Tribe, Mayan, Navajo Nation, Native Village of Barrow (Utqiagvik) Inupiat Traditional Government, Nome Eskimo Community, etc.)
race.child_provide_name_of_tribe: Provide the name of the tribe in which your child is enrolled or affiliated or your child's tribal descent. (For example: Aztec, Blackfeet Tribe, Mayan, Navajo Nation, Native Village of Barrow (Utqiagvik) Inupiat Traditional Government, Nome Eskimo Community, etc.)
race.asian_note: (For example: Asian Indian, Chinese, Filipino, Japanese, Korean, Vietnamese, etc.)
race.black_or_african_note: (For example: African American, Ethiopian, Haitian, Jamaican, Nigerian, Somali, etc.)
race.hispanic_or_spanish_note: (For example: Colombian, Cuban, Dominican, Mexican or Mexican American, Puerto Rican, Salvadoran, etc.)
race.middleeastern_or_african_note: (For examle: Algerian, Egyptian, Iranian, Lebanese, Moroccan, Syrian, etc.)
race.hawaiian_or_islander: Native Hawaiian or other Pacific Islander
race.hawaiian_or_islander_note: (For example: Chamorro, Fijian, Marshallese, Native Hawaiian, Tongan, etc.)
race.white_note: (For example: English, European, French, German, Irish, Italian, Polish, etc.)

gender.transgender_tip: A term describing a person whose gender identity and/or gender expression does not align with society’s expectations based on the sex they were assigned at birth
gender.nonbinary_tip: An umbrella term describing gender identities that are outside of the traditional gender binary of male or female
gender.genderqueer_tip: Denoting or relating to a person who does not subscribe to conventional gender distinctions but identifies with neither, both, or a combination of male and female genders.
gender.genderfluid_tip: A term describing a person whose gender identity and/or gender expression is not always the same
gender.agender_tip: A term describing someone who does not have a gender
gender.twospirit_tip: An umbrella term used by some Indigenous North Americans to describe Native people in their communities who fulfill a traditional third-gender ceremonial and social role in their cultures
gender.questioning: Questioning or unsure of gender identity

source.internet: General internet/Online sources (search engines, patient advocacy group website, blogs, online newsletter, etc.)
source.media: Media (news media program, print or digital advertisement, promotional video, article in magazine or newspaper, radio or podcasts, brochure, etc.)
source.advocacy_group: Advocacy Group (Cancer patient advocacy group, Cancer related-nonprofit, Other Patient Organizations)
source.wom: Word of mouth (friend/family, study staff, study participants, patient, support group, etc.)
source.study_staff: Study leader or staff, Count Me In team member
source.doctor: Doctor/Clinical care center (physician, doctor’s office, hospital or medical institution, treatment center, etc.)
source.physician: Physician, doctor, nurse, other medical professional etc.
source.hospital: Hospital, medical institution, or treatment center
source.event: Event (patient conference, science or research symposium, networking event, etc.)
source.science_conference: Science or research talk, conference, or symposium

option.none_describe_me: None of these fully describe me
option.none_describe_my_child: None of these fully describe my child
